channel.title: 1.2 Subnet :: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Info Since there is currently no need for a database or other services, you will only create public subnet. A subnet is a range of IP addresses in your VPC. A subnet must reside in a single Availability Zone. After creating a VPC, you can add EC2 instance(s) to the subnet. Create Public Subnet At the VPC management console: Click Subnets. Click Create subnet. At the Create subnet page, enter the following information:
